title: lost lost series after one win and one loss??!!
body:
RITO HELP!

I just climbed back up to promos for bronze two, and I was granted a free win. I played a game (draven vs name jhin was not fun) and we lost... BUT I FAILED MY SERIES. I don't understand what happened, and why the series was lost after one loss... pls help.

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, dodges count as losses in a promotion series and disqualifies you from any *Promo Helper* advantage as well.

Let me know if you have any questions.

(thank you very much for responding so quickly :D I appreciate the help)

I am aware of that, but I'm 90 percent sure I didn't dodge a game... unless I dodged think I was leaving a draft or flex game...

I checked your account and confirmed that a dodge happened during your promos, which then counted as a loss. This is why your single match loss ended your series.

I hope that cleared up the confusion.
Did you happen to dodge a game?  If so that counts as a loss in your series.
